documents.document: @RichardKrajicek The Flying Dutchman has been nominated as an inductee to ITHOF 2018 on 50th anniversary of first USO Final v Ashe. Support?
@MOReganIT Tough one! Wrong if he goes, wrong if he doesn't
@AodhBC If they were planned wouldn't be spontaneous
@AodhBC Not even when Dick Spring asked her to run for Europe?
@DorsetGirl1 Thought it flew by very quickly!
@spillaneda Plenty of time yet! https://t.co/E4Bp2jjLHj
@Ringham7 Canvassing important as Nick Bollettieri said Federer's letter of support for him was pivotal in him being inducted.
@stevegtennis 109 titles, only bettered by McEnroe, Connors, Bryan Bros. 78 Doubles a record for 23 years, beaten by Woodbridge, inducted 03
@stevegtennis Any chance of u endorsing Flying Dutchman for ITHOF 2018 50th anniversary of great 1st USO final v Ashe. 31 Singles 78 Doubles
@spillaneda Fantastic athlete. See you are knowledgeable too! Who are you supporting tomorrow?
@Ringham7 Liked to watch him but did not see him at his best in real life. Pity all those earlier Tennis tapes seem to have been discarded
@Ringham7 Have nominated Okker for Hall of Fame 2018. 50th anniversary since great 1968 tussle with Ashe. Any help would be appreciated.
@Ringham7 Mansour is such a great character.
@Ringham7 First time I saw Lew was Irish Open Final 1968. Great person and athlete
@BillieJeanKing Wonderful person And athlete
@hotdog6969 @BenRothenberg Of course not. 5 sets is fantastic, Pub full watching Dimitrov v Nadal. And this in Dublin in the morning
@Ringham7 And continued with Ashe, Smith, Nastase, Kodes, Okker, Connors. Panatta, Borg, Gerulaitis and McEnroe
In years to come! https://t.co/Hf9urtRHW2
@AodhBC Flat enough anyway!
@Vijay_Amritraj Have nominated The Flying Dutchman for induction in Tennis Hall of Fame for 2018, 50th anniversary of 1st USO Final v Ashe.
@DorsetGirl1 @delposforehand When is he going to play again?
@Janie5Jones Don't think Gorman Ivanisevjc has been inducted yet. Wimbledon champion and 3 times runner up.
@abnamrowtt Is The Flying Dutchman a guest in Rotterdam?
@chda7777 @JanDeBakker Two children
@delposforehand Mayne better off without one.
@TimMayotte Any memories of The Flying Dutchman? Think he should be inducted to ITHOF in July as 2018 50th anniversary of USO v Arthur Ashe
@Ringham7 Made indirect contact with Frew. Not very optimistic. But Tom is best known player of his era not inducted. 109 titles in S.and D.
@ATPWorldTour @RichardKrajicek Great interview Richard. Looking forward to seeing more volleys from Milos.
@joeldrucker Nice gesture if Okker was nominated ITHOF in July for 2018 as 50th anniversary of USO Final 1968 against Arthur Ashe.
@gugakuerten Woild be a nice gesture if Okker was selected in July for 2018 induction as it will be 50th anniversary 1968 USO Final v Ashe
@moutoussamyashe USO Final against Arthur. They were such good friends am sure Arthur would have liked it. Closing date for 2018, 31.3.2017
@moutoussamyashe Just thinking wouldn't it be a lovely gesture if Okker was inducted into ITHOF for 2018, being 50th anniversary of first
@Barry_FlatmanST Hreat to see this style of tennis again. Love it.
@AodhBC I'd like to be on my 50s too but for a different reason!
@AodhBC Did you see the mess they have made of the Marina?
@russellcfuller Great to see that style of tennis again !
@joeldrucker It seems to happen so quickly. One day 128 players and suddenly 16!
@Ringham7 Looking for contact address for Frew McMillan. Think it be nice if Okker was inducted into ITHOF 2018 on 50th anniversary '68 USO
@Ringham7 Marcusis one of my favourites
@Ringham7 @TennisReporters Not only that they all played around the same time. Terrible for opponents!
@russellcfuller By the way do you have a contact email for Frew McMillan. Is not on Social Media. Same message for him😊
@russellcfuller of 1968 USOpen? No.1 in world in doubles and Mo. 3 in singles. Nominations close end of March.Arthur would have liked it!
@russellcfuller Could discuss among your colleagues if there would be support for Flying Dutchman's induction ITHOF on. 50th anniversary
@AodhBC They all lived happily ever after😜
@toddwoodbridge close 31.3.2017 for 2018. Loving Australian Open. Thanks Todd.
@toddwoodbridge doubles record for 23 years till you passed him out. Nice gesture for 2018 which his friend Ashe would like. Nominations
@toddwoodbridge to ITHOF 2018 50th anniversary of first USOpen final v Ashe. Reached No.1 in world in doubles and No 3 in singles. Held
@toddwoodbridge Do you have a contact email for Frew McMillan. Looking for both of you great doubles players to nominate The Flying Dutchman
@joeldrucker @TennisChannel to be inducted in TennisHall of Fame when committee meet in July. Would be nice gesture and Ashe would approve
@joeldrucker @TennisChannel Has anybody noticed next year will be 50th anniversary of Okker v Ashe Final 1st US Open. Should be nominated
@stevegtennis He was 2 sets and a break up against Delpo in final of DVis Cup and lost in 5.Also up a break in 5th set so nothing new!
@BLKFacts And Flying Dutchman still not in Tennis Hall of Fame. Maybe next year for 50th anniversary. It would be a nice gesture & appropria
@DonaldTendulkar @usopen The Flying Dutchman should be in Hall of Fame. Next year will be 50th anniversary of first USA Open so maybe then!!
@newsFour Is that 18th or 25th?
@spillaneda for their image! But on the night audience went crazy about a woman who adopted Romanian kids, from Cork. So best laid plans....
@spillaneda Remember once Calor decided before final a certain housewife from Malahide who was interested in environment should win. Good f
@spillaneda HaHa 😂 Denis even if they had I would have made a mess of it.
@spillaneda Earned lots of overtime out of Housewife of the Year!
@spillaneda Denis C-K are paying my pension now😜
@McEnroeTweets Nah! The Flying Dutchman !
@Janie5Jones Sometimes tomatoes taste a bit bitter
@bcessay Don't think it could be 1958! Think about 1976!
@hotdog6969 So difficult after injury. Maybe have chat with Delpo
@LaureusSport When?
@vamosdelpofans Oh sorry. Thought it was a discussion group.
@vamosdelpofans Great news. However I hate that Delpo hires Jorge to let us know. PR gone too far in my opinion
@hotdog6969 @matchpointmiss Present. Ferrer Delpo. Rafa Past. The Flying Dutchman
@lobwinners How long have you been watching tennis?
@russellcfuller Doesn't seem to have recovered like Delpo yet. Fingers crossed. Great 👍 person
@MarshsLibrary @Library_RIA I always find it very intimidating. The staff look at me as if to say where do you think you are going !
@AodhBC I know a person who wouldn't read a secondhand book or library because of germs yet uses money!
@Sammyb01 @hotdog6969 But apart from Federer and Delpo players don't know how to volley Noe!
@TennisHalloFame Thought Delpo might be there! https://t.co/7YZaNvRFAP
@SereneEmbrace Well ok 👌 in Olympics where there are only 3 🥇
@_markpetchey @savetherhino HaHa 😂 thought it was going to be Delpo!
@vamosdelpofans Wish he wasn't using PR guy though. Doesn't need it. It's too false for me and doesn't do him justice.
@spillaneda Missed you! Welcome back Denis.
@ATPWorldTour @TheBorisBecker His good sportsmanship when Goran beat him in Wimbledon final.
@delpoarmy @catrinatina @YouTube Can't understand why he is not going to Australia.
@delposforehand Oity Delpo won't be there. Still basking in Davis Cuo glory😜😂
@servebot3000 @Janie5Jones He knew it was the only way to beat Delpo!
@AodhBC Easy knowing you don't live in Sandymount!
@AodhBC They probably don't notice either!
@MOReganIT @IrishTimes I got a prize from him at a school prize giving ceremony in about 1960 in Sandymount High School. Fond memories!
@delposforehand @Wimbledon @MercedesCup @jorgeviale @delpotrojuan Am really surprised that Delpo and others find it necessary to employ PR .
@AodhBC Remember when a record or a cd was a present; now just a stocking filler.
@conor_pope @IrishTimes So sad! Using a day's holidays to buy stuff instead if a day with the family.
@MOReganIT @IrishTimes I think we all have them. Great that you can bring them somewhere. It relieves the guilt somehow!
@AodhBC I wouldn't go if you paid me. Anyway any new clothes you need before Christmas and not afterwards!
@AodhBC Have noticed Denis's absence !
@Janie5Jones Such a waste!
@delpoarmy @kyoko_em @sebatorok But surely he can't be that tired. Has not played for 6 weeks.
HAPPY CHRISTMAS TO ALL MY TWITTER FRIENDS👍🍷🍾🍻 https://t.co/PcDoW3Tid2
@Ringham7 to be the centre of attention. Surprised as most celebrities love it.
@Ringham7 Surprised no book written about The Flying Dutchman with his Jewish background, tennis career and art dealer. Hear he doesn't like
@Ringham7 See your book Matchpoint is still doing well 40 years after publication! Loved it and what a gentleman Marty is. One of the best.
@Janie5Jones Did Vilas and Clerc show up?
@Svemara @MichalSamulski Can't understand it. He's already had a long break.
@MOReganIT Remember back in the day I used to do it all on Christmas Eve. That was when a cd was a present 🎁 and not a stocking filler!
@TheDolgo Just think of what Delpo went through and you will. be ok.
